response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $800,000. We are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at this exclusive price. Please consider this as an investment in future success and growth. If you're interested in learning more about the product and how it can benefit your business, please let me know. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 800000}
